{/* Plants illustration */} {/* Main heading */}

OUR STORY

{/* Story content */}

Karl and Isabel first met in the late summer of 2018 when they started working together. Despite Karl's reserved nature, Isabel's curiosity and persistence in getting to know him over the coming years formed a great friendship that would end up growing into so much more. Hints over the years subtly foreshadowed their relationship like when Isabel, smitten with Karl, wrote him a sweet card as his secret Santa. After writing the card, she was worried he would read too much into it, so to play it cool she wrote cards for everyone else in the office too. Little did she know, her gesture would lead Karl to realize his own feelings for her.

Fast forward a year, and covid hit. There's really nothing like a global pandemic to make you realize who you can't live your life without, so naturally it wasn't long after returning from quarantine that the universe pushed them together. A night out in Jersey City with their friends turned into them alone at the waterfront, and that's when their love story truly began.

In the past 4 years since then, their time together has been an amazing adventure, full of laughter, love, and unforgettable moments. They've traveled whenever possible, welcomed The Lizard King Gian-Carlo Miguelez Anderson into their lives, and recently became homeowners. They are so excited to begin this next chapter as husband and wife!
